def DMYearLevel_pseudo(df):

    df = df.withColumn("DisplayName", when(df.BusinessDesc == "Unknown", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Ungraded", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "SecondaryUngraded", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "PrimaryUngraded", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Childcare", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "4yo Kindergarten", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "3yo Kindergarten", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "TwoYearsBeforeYear1", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Pre-Year 1", "Prep")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Pre-School", "Prep")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "OneYearBeforeYear1", "Prep")
                                        .otherwise(df.BusinessDesc)
                                        )

    return df

def DMCampus_pseudo(df):
    df = df.filter(df.DioceseName == 'Townsville') \
            .filter(df.SchoolName !=  'Townsville Catholic Education Office') \
            .filter(df.SchoolName !=  'Canossa Convent School') \
            .filter(df.SchoolName !=  'St Patrick\'s College Townsville')

    return df
